page.title: 18A MUSLIM WEEKEND IN ST JAMES
page.content: On Saturday and Sunday I get up at 5.00 go to the bathroom to brush my teeth & wash my face.Then I have my breakfast of cornflakes,cold milk & orange juice. By 6.00 I am ready to prepare for my prayers.First I wash my hands up to my wrists three times,and I rinse my mouth three times.Then I wash my face three times.This is followed by washing my hands up to the elbows.I wash my hair and my feet right before left.Then I am ready for my prayers.I go downstairs put out my special carpet,face east and pray.After prayer I go to my room and read the Koran.At 8.00 I put the Koran and carpet away on special shelves and do my Bengali homework until 9.00.From 9.00 till 12.00 I am free to do as I wish.At 12.00 I go to Bengali school to study eight subjects-Bengali,Maths,Geog raphy,History,Arabic,Science,Sociology, and Pagnigation(explained on page 19).
